data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko, Saito, Rie (2016): First record of Plethus Hagen (Trichoptera, Hydroptilidae) from Japan, with description of a species. Zootaxa 4154 (4): 466-476, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4154.4.6|6 occurrences
